eyethinkphysiosync 0.3.2

    data_output-vignette eyethinkphysiosync-vignette

Function reference

All functions

crqa_dyads()
Vectorized rqa over a set of timeseries grouped by gid single or multidimensional figures out all possible dyads in set and runs rqa on them
crqa_full()
Runs through a set of standardized rqa metrics, by running crqa_trials() for each
crqa_means()
Averages a table of pairwise comparisons over people (default), trials or conditions
crqa_trials()
Runs crqa, mdcrqa or mdrqa on pairs or groups
emotibit_compile()
Runs through data folder, collating named emotibit DVs (edv) into one file
emotibit_getsessionfolders()
given a datafolder filepath, or named directory in working directory, or nothing it returns a list of emotibit session folders
emotibit_heartpy()
Run heartpy through data to regenerate heart rate
emotibit_parser()
Run emotibit data through parser to make files for each sensor
emotibit_process()
Organize, process and compiles emotibit raw data files and .json files
emotibit_session_folders()
Organize emotibit raw data files and .json files, into labelled session folders. Will default to using the eyethink lab key to translate the emotibit serial IDs into soemthing more friendly
gorilla_eid_corrections()
corrects eid from list of pid throughout data packet
gorilla_emotibit_eid()
Get ID from gorilla questionnaire
gorilla_physio_presentation()
Process gorilla data from task 'AV block multiple stim types'
gorilla_physio_test()
Process gorilla data from test phase of physiological sync experiment
physio_merge()
Label physio data with trial info labels the data stream with participant and condition info based on eid and timestamp
physio_movie()
Animates a physio_timeplot, scales and adds to stimulus video into a composite movie
physio_timeplot()
plots data from dm

Developed by DCR.
